body_html:
I'm getting this same error trying to build a custom operator on Ubuntu 14.04 using TF 1.3 GPU installed from pip.

I'm following these instructions

TF_INC=$(python -c 'import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.sysconfig.get_include())')
g++ -std=c++11 -shared word2vec_ops.cc word2vec_kernels.cc -o word2vec_ops.so -fPIC -I $TF_INC -O2 -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0

found here:

https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/tutorials/embedding

Would be really grateful if anyone has solved this

body:
I'm getting this same error trying to build a custom operator on Ubuntu 14.04 using TF 1.3 GPU installed from pip. 

I'm following these instructions

TF_INC=$(python -c 'import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.sysconfig.get_include())')
g++ -std=c++11 -shared word2vec_ops.cc word2vec_kernels.cc -o word2vec_ops.so -fPIC -I $TF_INC -O2 -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0

found here:

https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/tutorials/embedding

Would be really grateful if anyone has solved this
